job.title: Machine Learning Research Engineer
job.industry: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongWe invite you to join us to explore innovate develop and deliver stateofart endtoend machine learning solutions to customers and the academic research community As a Machine Learning Research Engineer you will join a team of deep learning research scientists within Intel Labs AI Lab In your role you will work with the research scientists participating in all phases of endtoend machine learning solutions development  including technical design implementation quality assurance and performance optimization resolving challenging customer pain points in scaling machine learning solutionsbrbrstronguAs a Machine Learning Research Engineer You WillbrbrustrongIn either research environments or specific product environments utilize current programming methodologies to translate machine learning models and data processing methods into softwarebrbrComplete programming testing debugging documentation andor deployment of the solutionproductsbrbrImplement machine learning algorithms such as supervised and unsupervised learning reinforcement learning transfer learning and others to solve applied problems in various disciplines such as Computer Vision Natural Language Processing Robotics Cybersecurity etcbrbrstronguBehavioral Traits That We Are Looking Forbrustrongulli Verbal and written communication skillslili Work in a collaborative research environmentbrliulThis position involves work on a US Government contract which may impose certain security requirements If you are a US citizen the government may require that you certify that you are a US citizen If you are not a US citizen the government may require you to pass a security check before you can be approved to work on the project Please note that any offer by Intel for this position is conditioned upon meeting andor passing the US governments security check requirements should the government impose these requirementsbrbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongMinimum qualifications are required to be initially considered for this position Preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum requirements and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates Requirements listed would be obtained through a combination of industry relevant job experience internship experiences and or schoolworkclassesresearchbrbrstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongThe candidate must possess a Bachelors degree with 4 years experience Masters degree with 2 years experience or PhD degree with 1 years experience in Electrical Engineering Computer Engineering Computer Science or Applied MathematicsbrbrstronguExperience In Below AreasbrustrongulliProcessing sensor signals video time series audio etc and developing algorithms based on MLDL techniques for realworld complex AI problems or building AI libraries frameworks and systemsliliDeepMachine Learning frameworks Tensorflow PyTorch SKLearn Including implementing training architectures on CPUs and GPUsliliPython or CliliCloud andor Edge based architecturebrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliDemonstrated research experience publications at ML conferencesliliDeveloping applications for computer vision natural language processing cybersecurity or radio frequency machine learningliliOptimizing algorithms for memory and resource constraint hardware platformsbrliulIntel harware optimization libraries including OpenVINO MKLDNN etcbrbrstrongInside this Business GroupbrbrstrongIntel Labs is the companys worldclass industry leading research organization responsible for driving Intels technology pipeline and creating new opportunities The mission of Intel Labs is to deliver breakthrough technologies to fuel Intels growth This includes identifying and exploring compelling new technologies and high risk opportunities ahead of business unit investment and demonstrating firsttomarket technologies and innovative new usages for computing technology Intel Labs engages the leading thinkers in academia and industry in addition to partnering closely with Intel business unitsbrbrstrongOther
